mapper.insert: INSERT INTO category (id, cat_level, label, parent_id, is_leafs, is_common, path, is_delete, is_wide_table) VALUES (#{id}, #{catLevel}, #{label}, #{parentId}, #{isLeafs}, #{isCommon}, #{path}, #{isDelete}, #{isWideTable})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM category WHERE is_leafs = 0
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM category WHERE is_leafs = 1
SELECT label FROM category WHERE label = #{label}
SELECT * FROM category WHERE cat_level=2 and parent_id='1' and is_delete=0;
SELECT * FROM category WHERE parent_id = #{pid} and is_leafs=0 and is_delete=0;
SELECT * FROM category WHERE is_common = 0 and is_leafs = 1;
SELECT * FROM category WHERE is_common = 1 and is_leafs = 1;
SELECT label from category where id = #{id};
mapper.update: update category set label=#{tableName}, status=#{tableStatus} where id = CAST(#{tableid} AS VARCHAR);;
update category set status=1 where id = #{id} ; update table_describe set table_status=1 where table_id = #{id};
update category set status=0 where id = #{id}; update table_describe set table_status=0 where table_id = #{id};
